incentives.description: Fuel economy inputs for GB mx

loan.description: In GB, loan is called Tesla Loan

extra_copy.content: All cars have Dual Motor All-Wheel Drive, adaptive air suspension, premium interior and sound.

Autopilot advanced safety and convenience features are designed to assist you with the most burdensome parts of driving. All new Tesla cars come standard with driver assistance features such as emergency braking, collision warning and blind-spot monitoring.

Tesla All-Wheel Drive has two independent motors that digitally control torque to the front and rear wheelsfor far better handling and traction control. Your car can drive on either motor, so you don't need to worry about getting stuck on the road.
* Costs above include potential incentives and gas savings of {SAVING_PRICE}.
All prices are shown without potential incentives or gas savings of {SAVING_PRICE}.
* Prices shown include the {INCENTIVE_AMOUNT} {NAME_OF_INCENTIVE} and potential incentives and gas savings of {SAVING_PRICE}.
Prices shown without the {INCENTIVE_AMOUNT} {NAME_OF_INCENTIVE} and potential incentives and gas savings of {SAVING_PRICE}.
For fast and touchless delivery, view our inventory vehicles

Tesla All-Wheel Drive has two independent motors for improved redundancy, each with only one moving part for minimal maintenance and maximum durability. Unlike traditional all-wheel drive systems, they digitally control torque to the front and rear wheels for far better handling and traction control.

props.classes: tds-text--h6 tds-text--start text-loader--subtitle tds-text--500 tds-text_color--30 tds--vertical_padding-10

extra_copy.content: Model X offers up to 91 ft of cargo space, including a secure front boot, and can seat up to 7 adults. The front boot can fit a full-size carry-on suitcase, and the rear seats can fold flat at the press of a button, opening up the rear cargo area and under-floor storage for maximum flexibility to fit any lifestyle.

Front doors automatically open as you approach with your phone. Easily close the drivers door with a tap of the brake pedal, and control the Falcon Wing Doors, front boot and rear liftgate from the center display or your Tesla Mobile App.

A unique layer of protection for Tesla vehicles continuously monitors the environment around the car when its left unattended. When enabled, Sentry Mode enters a Standby state, like many home alarm systems, which uses the cars external cameras to help detect and protect against potential threats.
Model X offers five, six and seven-seat configuration options  each enabling a functional and comfortable cabin experience.

With 2200x1300 resolution, ultra-bright colors and exceptional responsiveness, the new centre display is an ideal touchscreen for entertainment and gaming anywhere. A second display in front of the driver shows various vehicle information, and a third display provides entertainment and controls for rear passengers.
Up to 10 teraflops of processing power enables in-car gaming on-par with todays newest consoles via Tesla Arcade. Wireless controller compatibility allows gaming from any seat.

Airflow and temperature are controlled entirely through the displays without any physical vents. On hot days, Cabin Overheat Protection ensures interiors always stay cool. In cold weather, pre-conditioning automatically warms the cabin and prepares the battery for maximum range.
The ultimate focus on driving: no stalks, no shifting. With a stalkless steering yoke, you can enjoy both the best SUV to drive, and the best SUV to be driven in.
A 22-speaker, 960-watt audio system offers the best listening experience at home or on the road, and new microphones enable active noise cancelling.

Automatic driving from motorway on-ramp to off-ramp includes automatic lane changes, Traffic-Aware Cruise Control with complete stopping and re-engagement, Autosteer, and overtaking slow cars in your lane.

While driving on the motorway, Automatic Lane Change will position your car in the optimal lane to prepare for merges and exits while overtaking slow cars. Drivers are given clear insight to upcoming lane changes as well as customisation to Auto Lane Change functionality.

Park with ease in both parallel and perpendicular parking spaces with a single button tap on the Center Display. Model X will alert you to available parking spots by continuously monitoring the space around you.

Activated by the Tesla App, your parked car will come find you and even park or unpark itself in tight spaces. Smart Summon navigates complex parking situations while abiding by lane markings and stop signs, avoiding pedestrians and obstacles like traffic cones, rubbish bins and rogue shopping trolleys.
Tesla-designed silicon optimised for computer vision enables detailed, onscreen environment visualisation and eventual Full Self-Driving Capability through over-the-air software updates.

Included with every new Tesla, Autopilot enables your car to steer, accelerate and brake automatically for other vehicles and pedestrians within its lane. There to assist with the most burdensome parts of driving, Autopilot works alongside features like emergency braking, collision warning and blind-spot monitoring.

Tesla All-Wheel Drive uses independent front and rear motors for improved performance and traction in all conditions, enabling lightning-fast response from the accelerator pedal. Unlike traditional engines, Teslas motors and powertrain require no scheduled maintenance for the lifetime of ownership.

Charge anywhere there is electricity. Most range used for daily driving can be topped off using the included Mobile Connector Bundle and an approved outlet, or upgrade to a Tesla Wall Connector for the best home charging experience. For long distance travel, Model X adds up to 175 miles of range in just 15 minutes on Teslas Supercharger network.

Remotely control and monitor your Tesla with Phone Key keyless driving, range & charging status, climate control, live GPS location and more. You can even schedule service and monitor your entire Tesla ecosystem, including power flow from Powerwall or from Solar Roof and Solar Panels.

Our fully adaptive suspension responds to road conditions and driver input hundreds of time per second to give you better steering response, sporty handling and improved ride comfort, and the system will automatically lower itself based on speed and road type for improved efficiency and range. Like many Tesla systems, our adaptive suspension will continue to improve over time with over-the-air software updates.

The largest all glass panoramic windshield in production provides a seamless view of the stars and sky above. Optimised solar tinting and an obstruction-free view creates unlimited visibility for the driver and up to six passengers.

A HEPA filtration system capable of stripping the outside air of pollen, bacteria, and pollution before they enter the cabin systematically scrubs the air inside the cabin to eliminate any trace of these particles, resulting in a system hundreds of times more efficient than standard automotive filters.

Access nearly all vehicle features on the expansive 17-inch touchscreen  designed to improve over time with regular software updates to provide new entertainment and safety features, added functionality and new user experiences. While driving, the 12-inch display behind the steering wheel displays nearby vehicles, speed limit signs, upcoming traffic lights, pedestrians, cyclists and road hazards.

Stay comfortable in cold weather with front and rear seat heaters, a heated steering wheel, wiper blade defrosters and washer nozzle heaters. Using the Tesla mobile app, you can activate cabin and battery pre-conditioning to automatically warm the cabin and prep the cars battery for cold-weather driving to maximize range and efficiency.
Easily charge your smartphone, conveniently positioned in a centre-mounted holster for simple and secure docking

Tesla designed Model X from the ground-up as an electric vehicle  each component, including batteries, motors and exterior aerodynamics are optimised to benefit from one another and create one of the most efficient, yet unbelievably powerful vehicles ever built.
Premium audio system specifically tuned for a Teslas ultra-quiet cabin
Cold weather features including heated seats for every passenger, heated steering wheel, wiper blade defrosters and washer nozzle heaters
Automatic opening and closing on all doors and rear boot
LED fog lamps and multi-position cornering lights
Tinted glass roof with ultraviolet and infrared protection
Auto dimming, power folding, heated side mirrors
Wireless phone charging in center console
88 cubic feet of cargo space including a secure front boot
Emergency lane departure avoidance and correction
Model X includes Navigation standard and a 1 year Premium Connectivity trial enabling:
Video Streaming, allowing access to content from Netflix, Youtube, Twitch, and more
Premium 22-speaker audio with active noise cancelling
Multi-device music and media over Bluetooth
17 centre display, 12.3 drivers display, and 8 second row display
Gaming computer with 10 teraflops of processing power
Ultraviolet and infrared protection on all glass
Heated seats for every passenger, heated steering and heated windshield
Custom driver profiles with automatic easy-entry and exit
Automatic opening and closing front doors
Front center console with sliding cup holders and storage
Automatic opening and closing rear liftgate
Auto dimming, power folding, heated side mirrors
2,577 litres of cargo space including a secure front boot
Video Streaming with access to Netflix, Youtube, Twitch, and more

Internet Browser
*New features that become available after delivery may be subject to additional charges.

Activated by the Tesla App, your parked car will come find you and even park or unpark itself in tight spaces. Smart Summon navigates complex parking situations while abiding by lane markings and stop signs, avoiding pedestrians and obstacles like traffic cones, rubbish bins and rogue shopping trolleys.

Park with ease in both parallel and perpendicular parking spaces with a single button tap on the Center Display. Model X will alert you to available parking spots by continuously monitoring the space around you.

Automatic driving from motorway on-ramp to off-ramp includes automatic lane changes, Traffic-Aware Cruise Control with complete stopping and re-engagement, Autosteer, and overtaking slow cars in your lane.

While driving on the motorway, Automatic Lane Change will position your car in the optimal lane to prepare for merges and exits while overtaking slow cars. Drivers are given clear insight to upcoming lane changes as well as customisation to Auto Lane Change functionality.
High strength steel tow bar with a removable adapter. With 2,268 kilograms of towing capacity, you can easily bring your bike or ski carrier on your next road trip.
Automatic steering, acceleration and braking on motorways
Vehicle cannot be upgraded to Full Self-Driving Capability

The currently enabled features require active driver supervision and do not make the vehicle autonomous. The activation and use of these features are dependent on achieving reliability far in excess of human drivers as demonstrated by billions of miles of experience, as well as regulatory approval, which may take longer in some jurisdictions. As these self-driving features evolve, your car will be continuously upgraded through over-the-air software updates.
Enables your car to steer, accelerate and brake automatically for other vehicles and pedestrians within its lane.

The currently enabled features require active driver supervision and do not make the vehicle autonomous. The activation and use of these features are dependent on achieving reliability far in excess of human drivers as demonstrated by billions of miles of experience, as well as regulatory approval, which may take longer in some jurisdictions. As these self-driving features evolve, your car will be continuously upgraded through over-the-air software updates.
All functionality of Basic Autopilot and Enhanced Autopilot
Traffic Light and Stop Sign Control

The currently enabled features require active driver supervision and do not make the vehicle autonomous. Some features require turn signals and are limited in range. The activation and use of these features are dependent on achieving reliability far in excess of human drivers as demonstrated by billions of miles of experience, as well as regulatory approval, which may take longer in some jurisdictions. As these self-driving features evolve, your car will be continuously upgraded through over-the-air software updates. Please read the Owners Manual for further information.
Includes all functionality of Basic Autopilot and Enhanced Autopilot. Recognize and respond to traffic lights and stop signs.
Autopilot is a pre-requite for Full Self-Driving Capability and will be added to your cart for an additional price
Autopilot is a pre-requisite for Full Self-Driving Capability and will be added to your cart for an additional price
Autopilot is a pre-requisite for Full Self-Driving Capability; after you purchase Autopilot, your vehicle will be eligible for the Full Self-Driving Capability subscription.
A Full Self-Driving computer installation of ##cost## is required. Once the installation is complete, you will be eligible to subscribe.

By ##ACTION##, your saved payment method will be charged and auto-billed monthly. To learn more visit ##termsAndConditions##.

Full Self-Driving Capability Subscription can be cancelled anytime, however, they cannot be refunded. To learn more visit ##cancellationPolicy##.

If applicable, tax is calculated based on the address provided while placing an order.

The current Full Self-Driving features require active driver supervision and do not make the vehicle autonomous. The future use of these features without supervision is dependent on achieving reliability far in excess of human drivers as demonstrated by billions of miles of experience, as well as regulatory approval, which may take longer in some jurisdictions.
Includes Navigation on Autopilot, Auto Lane Change, Autopark and Summon
Autopilot is a pre-requisite for Enhanced Autopilot and will be added to your cart for an additional price

$CC01.name: Five Seat
$CC01.description: Comfortably seat five adults in two rows. Second row seats can fold flat when not in use, creating extra interior cargo space.

$CC02.name: Six Seats
$CC02.description:
Passenger capacity and spaciousness are balanced by open access between the second and third row. Third row seats fold flat and flush when not in use creating extra cargo space.

Rear air conditioning and heating system included.

$CC04.name: Seven Seats
$CC04.description:
Maximize passenger and cargo capacity with seating for seven adults. Second and third row seats can fold flat when not in use, creating extra interior cargo space.

Rear air conditioning and heating system included.

$CC12.name: Six Seat Interior with Center Console
$CC12.description:
Add a color matched center console for second row passengers, providing two additional cup holders and a storage cubby under the armrest. The center console is not removable and requires factory installation.

Rear air conditioning and heating system included.
$CC12.long_name: Six Seat Interior with Center Console

extra_copy.content: *Available on Wi-Fi only with Standard Connectivity

By ##ACTION##, your saved payment method will be charged and auto-billed monthly. To learn more visit ##termsAndConditions##.

Premium Connectivity subscription can be cancelled anytime, however, it cannot be refunded. To learn more visit ##cancellationPolicy##.

If applicable, tax is calculated based on address provided while placing an order.
